params.amount: Amount of tokens to evaluate according to 'reverse' order

returns._0: Depending on 'reverse' order:                     false - return USD amount equal to 'amount' of 'cToken' in wei                     true - return cTokens equal to 'amount' of USD

params.amount: Amount of tokens to evaluate according to 'reverse' order

returns._0: Depending on 'reverse' order:                     false - return USD amount equal to 'amount' of 'cToken' in wei                     true - return cTokens equal to 'amount' of USD

params.cToken: The cToken to get the underlying price of

returns._0: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18).  Zero means the price is unavailable.

EXP_SCALE().notice: A common scaling factor to maintain precision

getEvaluation(address,uint256,bool).notice: Evaluates input amount according to stored price, accrues interest

getEvaluationStored(address,uint256,bool.notice: Evaluates input amount according to stored price, doesn't accrue interest

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a cToken asset

isPriceOracle().notice: Indicator that this is a PriceOracle contract (for inspection)
